website_summaries.verdict: Chances are you'll have to refill this little sugar bowl fairly often, but with its cute egg design, you may not mind.
pros: Offers a small footprint and sleek egg-shaped design
Has a sturdy base and spoon slot
cons: Only holds about a cup of sugar
Though it comes with a spoon, it is also small and not very useful

customer_reviews.title: Nice. I am pleased.
customer_reviews.text: The item is nice I like the size I like the spoon but the problem is the lid falls inside of the jar very, very easily. Update: I returned the defective one and ordered another one. I am very pleased with it, so much so that I ordered another one. I hope it will be good too The company did contact me, so I am pleased with the customer service too. Update on 3rd order : all good. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Akasha

customer_reviews.title: Functional, cute, and unobtrusivee
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty cute: a petite sugar bowl that sits unobtrusively on the counter among dry goods and utensil canisters, coffee maker and grinder. It's not airtight but it holds just over a cup, so if you use about a teaspoon a day you'll have to re-fill only about once a month. The spoon is a round half-bowl shape that will hold a 1/2 teaspoon measure, but it requires you to work a little to scoop that much- so it's good if you're trying to limit sugar intake without eliminating it altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Karen, Raleigh, N.C.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This item is very modern looking. It keeps the counter looking neat, tidy and coordinated. The lid closes easily over the spoon and it is easy to clean. The size and shape is perfect to hold spices, sauces, salt, sugar. I have ghee in mine. I'm already recommending it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Honest MacGyver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent looking sugar bowl, but hate the spoon!
customer_reviews.text: Love the SS and the overall look of this sugar bowl! However, i couldn’t give 5 star because the spoon is awkward to get sugar out with and doesn’t hold much. We end up everyday with having raw sugar crystals on the counter which is an annoyance to clean up. I’m looking for a diff spoon that will fit in this bowl. Then it will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sue W.

customer_reviews.title: Strongly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing. I use it for salt and it’s awesome. I’ve had it for about a year and it’s still working well for me. It’s sturdy and doesn’t easily tip over. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Perryman

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you dont need the spoon
customer_reviews.text: The spoon is a complete joke!!!!!! Not even functional. It seems to be something for a dollhouse. Imagine a fingernail. This is how big the scoop is on the spoon. Give me a dang break. It is not functional. What is the point in that?
customer_reviews.author: BUYER

customer_reviews.title: Metallic smell
customer_reviews.text: It’s really cute but has a metallic smell and the brand sticker leaves the outline mark that I can’t get off. It matches my other stainless appliances in my kitchen so I still would recommend it if your looking for matching items. The included spoon is cute but small.
customer_reviews.author: busyactonmom

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel Egg-shaped Sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. She wanted something small, that wouldn't take up much space on the counter. She wanted the lid, with hole for spoon, that would sit on top. This met her expectations, and she loves the shape, and satin brushed finish, and it looks nice sitting by the coffee maker. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. Great sleek design that will go with any decor. Best of all, I won’t have to worry about someone dropping this and having it shatter on our ceramic tile floor! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hightest

customer_reviews.title: Love the way it looks.  Makes a great grease bowl on the stove.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for saving my bacon grease on the stove. It looks so much nicer than the standard grease cans. It is super cute and the little spoon is perfect for adding a little dab to the green beans or potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: QuinnInTN

customer_reviews.title: This bowl is great.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this quirky little container. They market it as a sugar bowl but I use it for salt. It is really quite handy for cooking as it is much easier to measure from this cute little egg than from my original salt package. Plus it looks good on my stove. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: The little spoon that is included is perfect for dispensing a consistent amount of sugar
customer_reviews.text: Very unique design and shape! I use this for my raw sugar, since it doesn't pour well in most sugar dispensers. The little spoon that is included is perfect for dispensing a consistent amount of sugar, or whatever you're using, each time. Good quality, I can't really see this thing ever having issues or needing replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Eggsactly What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully designed sugar, non-sugar sweetner, or for dry, non-dairy creamer. Lid could have fit a bit tighter. The scoop is worth the whole shebang. Scoop is less than a teaspoon, small, and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: G Dog

customer_reviews.title: Alluring sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: Awesome built quality. The sugar bowl speans for itself and catched the eyes of my guests easily. The scooper received the same compliments.
customer_reviews.author: o.segura

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS SMALL SUGAR BOWL!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. I received it within 30 hrs of placing order and it is perfect size for where I wanted it to sit.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: The lid does not fit properly
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute but unfortunately the lid does not fit properly the seller however knew that I wish they would fix their product then ship it it’s a waste of our time!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little sugar bowl with scoop! Fits perfect on our Nespresso machine and matches perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Junk

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!

customer_reviews.title: The spoon is 304 the container dose dot look 304
customer_reviews.text: I like it I like it but the jar is not 304 the spoon is

customer_reviews.title: Nice little sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice SMALL sugar bowl. I did read the dimensions, but thought it would be a little bigger- my mistake. Easy to clean. I got this because it is all metal and my kids won't be able to break it. :-) It is new, but I am very happy with the purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but much smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Adorable but much smaller than I thought. (I did not read the sizing on here before purchasing) Easy to clean and looks great in our break room.

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me. It is small enough to fit in the small space between my Keurig and my toaster oven. Very pretty and I love the petite size.

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to put next to my coffee machine. It's small enough and big enough to put about 5-6 tablespoons or maybe more. Buy it! It's unique.

customer_reviews.title: Compact and well made
customer_reviews.text: Really like this sugar bowl. Looks great on my coffee center. Compsct and well made

customer_reviews.title: Cute sugar bowl and holds good amount of sugar
customer_reviews.text: Cute sugar bowl and holds good amount of sugar. The lid is not really tight if that's what your looking for but works well for me.

customer_reviews.title: very cute, but very difficult to pour sugar into ...

customer_reviews.author: Working Bee Mom

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small-footprint bowl for Splenda for my small-space coffee service. This one is definitely that, with the added bonus of a brushed stainless steel surface that resists fingerprints and mess! The included matching spoon is also 1 tsp equivalent, which is useful. Because of its egg shape, cleaning inside can be tricky, but I resolved that by never wetting the matching spoon: I use that spoon to put Splenda in my cup, then stir with another. Excellent bowl!
customer_reviews.author: Nunya Business

customer_reviews.title: Looks are deceiving
customer_reviews.text: The stainless steel is almost as thin as the thickest aluminum foil, the lid doesn't fit properly either. I returned asap, you are MUCH better off to look for something else. This will just end up being a disappointment and waste of your time due to having to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mottley

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sugar Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Great quality & price. I love the this sugar bowl with its own spoon & the design. Easy to clean & looks great on counter or table. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DebR

customer_reviews.title: Modern Sugar Bowl with great looks!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new sugar bowl! It looks great, and resists fingerprints very well. The nice little spoon matches the look and holds just the right amount of sugar for a coffee or tea. Even better, the bowl is surprisingly deep, so I don't have to refill it very often. This replaced an older one we had and we like this one much better!
customer_reviews.author: Collin W.

customer_reviews.title: Both functional and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Can't ask for more ... anytime i put it on the table, company comments on how striking and interesting this object is. I use it for sugar but i read here that others use it for salt, and i think it would work for any number of other dry, granulated, items.
customer_reviews.author: 1956 Redhead

customer_reviews.title: Its stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: I love this little sugar bowl with the spoon included. I use it for a salt scrub for my hands and keep it in the kitchen by the sink. It is egg shape and fits right in the proper room.
customer_reviews.author: L. Muller

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and Purposeful
customer_reviews.text: This makes my mornings that much easier. I hate having bags of sugar laying around exposed, but I also hate having to go into the pantry to get a sugar bag. This is just enough sugar not to cause problems on my counter or fill up too much space. And it is elegant to look at.
customer_reviews.author: OmoUltimate

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for hubby’s use to keep the sugar in the holder and off the bar. Did the job! He loves it so a win-win situation. Very sleek appearance.

customer_reviews.title: WOW!! Great gift for a wedding shower!!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little cutie!

I prefer a little coffee with my cream and sugar. I like that it is small. I do not like a lot of clutter on my countertop. It will probably require a weekly refill. I have used it yet, so I will update should my opinion change.

product_meta.title: Newness Stainless Steel Sugar Bowl with Lid and Sugar Spoon for Home, Egg Shape, 9.8 Ounces(290 Milliliter)
feature_bullets: Made of Stainless Steel, Unbreakable and Durable, Dishwasher Safe. We carefully measured the actual volume/capacity of the sugar bowl to make it clearly for our valued customers like you. Actual Volume: 9.8 Ounces ( 290 Milliliter or 1.2 Cup )
Modern Design for Home Tabletop Decoration
Suitable for Home, Hotel, Cafe, Buffet, Party, etc. Perfect to Serve Sugar, Pepper, Spice, etc.
A nice Sugar Bowl for family to serve sugar for coffee & milk. When getting up every morning, a cup of coffee, with a spoon of sugar. Oh! What a nice day! Take it and enjoy it!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars203 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
